Topic.Title: New Survival Horror Game: She Cried Against Strangling Hands

Posts.EditableText:
I'm proud to announce my second game: **She Cried Against Strangling Hands**!

She Cried Against Strangling Hands is a survival horror text adventure. Delve into the darkscape and unravel the mystery hidden within its immersive environments. Solve puzzles and uncover clues that reveal the grisly story, all while evading a nightmarish horror. The text is accompanied by an expansive soundtrack composed by Vulture Culture. Contains mature themes. 

I would love to hear what you think of it, I put my heart and soul into making this game. All feedback is welcome!

**Here's the link:** http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/dzb_rnnp40knwdfmlysnya/she-cried-against-strangling-hands
